page.title: 06Recreation
page.content: In this area there are no parks or recreation grounds, but people do find time for leisure activities. All the private gardens are beautiful because the villagers keep them tidy as they are proud of their villages. Some people like to sit in their gardens and read the newspaper. In summer there is a lot to do. You can go swimming at the Milton Lodge Hotel,or fishing in the River Stour, or for lovely walks. You can do gardening or go horseriding or play tennis.A lot of people go to the nurseries because gardening is their main hobby. There are nice places and lanes to go walking and jogging. Some fields and woods are good areas for picnics.
